body:
similarly, for sparseDims != dims, you can
```
I = D.nonzero()[:, :sparseDims]
uniq_I = I.unique(dim=0).t()
values = D[uniq_I.chunk(sparseDims)].squeeze_()
return torch.sparse_coo_tensor(uniq_I, values, D.shape)
```
body_html:
similarly, for sparseDims != dims, you can

I = D.nonzero()[:, :sparseDims]
uniq_I = I.unique(dim=0).t()
values = D[uniq_I.chunk(sparseDims)].squeeze_()
return torch.sparse_coo_tensor(uniq_I, values, D.shape)
body_text:
similarly, for sparseDims != dims, you can
I = D.nonzero()[:, :sparseDims]
uniq_I = I.unique(dim=0).t()
values = D[uniq_I.chunk(sparseDims)].squeeze_()
return torch.sparse_coo_tensor(uniq_I, values, D.shape)
